title: Club not showing!
body:
Hey, 

I've been part of a Club that I found called Basquiat and everytime I queue with my friends, the tag won't even show. On top of that, since the transition to the new client, I can't even see the club I made. Instead I'm being prompted to create a new club even when my friends can clearly see on their screen that I'm the club owner. Any thoughts on this issue?

replies.body: Your club may have lost sync.  Toss me the club name and tag, and I'll see if I can refresh it for you.  :D
